meanings: (분노·두려움으로) shake, tremble, quiver, shiver, shudder, quake
Verb be shaken off, be beaten off, fall off

meanings.meaning: my knees shook under me as...

vlive.korean: 너무 심장이 떨렸다. I was nervous. 듣기 View video EXID : <11월의 해주세요 - EXID의 송년회>
좋았다. - 떨렸다. I liked it. - I was nervous. 듣기 View video FTISLAND : FTISLAND 민환X승현 [2월 2남자의 2야기] MAKING FILM
vlive.english: I liked it. - I was nervous.

vlive.korean: 곱창 때문에 심장이 떨렸다 두근두근. This trip is making my heart race. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Replay] MAMAMOO Moon Byul & Whee In’s 마마무 문별&휘인 X 같이먹어요
vlive.english: This trip is making my heart race.

vlive.korean: 여러분들 많이 보고 계셔서 떨렸다. I was nervous because a lot of you are watching. 듣기 View video MELODYDAY : MelodyDay '차희의 그림을 그립시다'
vlive.english: I was nervous because a lot of you are watching.

vlive.korean: [아직도 심장이 너무 떨려서 그만...] 질투 나게 해도 되는 거야? [My heart beats every second I see you] make people jealous when you've known that person for 6 years? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [OH MY GIRL] 질투만땅 말랑뽀삐라면 6년 차여도 심장떨려🐶💓 (ARIN’s adorable jealousy)
vlive.english: [My heart beats every second I see you] make people jealous when you've known that person for 6 years?

examples.korean: My legs were trembling with fear. 발음듣기 나는 겁이 나서 다리가 떨렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My legs were trembling with fear. 발음

examples.korean: She gave an involuntary shudder. 발음듣기 그녀는 자기도 모르게 몸이 떨렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She gave an involuntary shudder. 발음

examples.korean: Her voice shook with emotion. 발음듣기 그녀의 목소리가 감정에 겨워 떨렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her voice shook with emotion. 발음

examples.korean: His voice wavered with emotion. 발음듣기 그의 목소리가 감정에 겨워 떨렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His voice wavered with emotion. 발음

examples.korean: Her voice wobbled with emotion. 발음듣기 그녀의 목소리는 감정에 겨워 떨렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her voice wobbled with emotion. 발음
